subject: docs: clean up stale documentation and update for new architecture
body:
Deleted (10 files):
- MANUAL_TESTING_GUIDE.md - referenced old vanilla JS structure
- UI_COMPONENT_HIERARCHY.md - referenced old vanilla JS structure
- USAGE_SCENARIOS_REVIEW.md - completed review, no longer needed
- financial_models_intercompany_software.md - superseded by BUSINESS_GUIDE.md
- model_*_concept.md (6 files) - design docs superseded by model-use-cases/

Updated:
- README.md - updated for TypeScript/SvelteKit architecture
- ARCHITECTURE.md - status changed from "In Progress" to "Complete"
- SESSION_NOTES.md - removed stale session notes, kept reference info
- TODO.md - removed completed items, kept feature ideas
- model-use-cases/README.md - corrected variant counts for Models 3 and 4
title: clean up stale documentation and update for new architecture
